sql-item.sql: SELECT u.user_id,r.mobile,w.openid,u.`name` from b2b_rights.uuc_supplier_silver_order a INNER join b2b_user.uuc_user u on a.pay_user_id=u.user_id and u.user_biz_type=1 left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record r on u.user_id=r.user_id left join ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on u.user_id=w.userid where a.pay_user_id not in(select pay_user_id from b2b_rights.uuc_supplier_silver_order where pay_status=1 GROUP BY pay_user_id) and a.pay_user_id not in ( select pay_user_id from b2b_rights.uuc_supplier_silver_order where date(submit_time)>date('2016-10-20') and pay_status<>1 and submit_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 30 DAY) and DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY pay_user_id ) and a.pay_user_id not in ( select u.user_id From b2b_op_activity.op_gold_supplier_view a INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user u on a.user_id=u.user_id left join (select supplier_id from b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic where supplier_level =1) b on a.company_id=b.supplier_id where date(a.last_visit_time)=date(date_add(now(),interval -1 DAY)) and u.user_biz_type=1 and b.supplier_id is null ) and a.submit_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 day) and now() group by u.user_id,w.openid
